item.title: A funny Interface
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

It’s a like dds spec, but in command. But also you can type whatever hit amount you want and the player will get hit. While doing this it sends a interface a long side with the dds spec, do this, and the interface will make you laugh.

item.title: A funny Interface
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

This was made for fun.

Why hello players!

1: create a folder anywhere, recommended spots below.

2: name your new Java file,

3: Copy/Paste this!

[code=java]
package com.oldschool.players.packets.interfaces;//Change your directory.

public class rareinterfaces
{
/**
* Sends an interface to the player.
* @param the interface Id, here 609.(double hits)
* @return The client instance.
*/
public InterfaceManager sendRareInterface(/*int 609, */int hitamount, int hitamount2, int player)
{
if (player2.player().getRights == 3);
player2.getInterface().OpenInterface(609);
player2.actions3().doHit2(hitamount, true);
player2.actions3().doHit2(hitamount2, true);
player2.player().getName.(player);
} else if (player2.player().getRights == 4);
player2.getInterface().OpenInterface(609);
player2.actions3().doHit2(hitamount, true);
player2.actions3().doHit2(hitamount, true);
player2.player().getName.(player);
player.sendGameMessages().sM(“Sorry but you were killed by the owner”);
player.getInterface().openInterface(609);
player.getInterface().openInterface(1);//logs him out, but continues the interface 609…
} else {
player.sendGameMessages().sM(“You can’t do this.”);
return this;
}[/code]

[center]Media:[/center]

Example:) ::command-609-3-96 mod mark
or
Example:) ::command-609-88-88 mod mark
or
Example:) ::command-609-90000-90000 mod mark…

Easy to convert to yours. :). Just make a command for this, this took 30 minutes to write. Same packet as a Dragon Dagger Spec(not really).

Read full topic
